settings.title: Well-designed controller layout for an outstanding gaming experience.
settings.text: The ergonomic design improves the excellent hands-on feeling; The integrated structure provides multiple solutions and precise&quick button responses; Soft rubber grips decrease fatigue in long-time gaming and let you enjoy every gaming moment.

settings.title: Upgraded Remappable buttons to customize gaming solutions.
settings.text: Assign the needed buttons to the remappable buttons to provide you with the ideal solution and precise clicks with a maximal assignment of 15 buttons.

settings.title: Built-in Trigger stops mechanism to highlight your gaming moments.
settings.text: The trigger mechanism covering the adaptive trigger and micro switch hair clicky trigger provides long or short-trip switchable trigger options to give you the full play.

settings.title: Custom joysticks with adjustment modules for the best joysticks accuracy.
settings.text: The embedded adjustment modules inside the controller enable the joysticks to remain centered without drifting and a deviated joystick within 0.12 can be adjusted.

settings.title: 8 in 1 Interchangeable textured thumbsticks options to find your advantage.
settings.text: Master your thumbsticks with multiple options of 2 different heights & 3 different ergonomic thumb grip designs in domed, concave, and concave widened.
